data.lyric:
[ti:The Long Way]
[ar:Brett Eldredge]
[al:Brett Eldredge]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Long Way - Brett Eldredge
[00:05.15]Written by：Brett Eldredge/Matt Rogers
[00:10.31]Don't think I've ever seen your kind of pretty
[00:14.38]
[00:16.21]Wandering 'round this midnight mad house city
[00:20.17]
[00:21.06]You got a look that says you got it all together
[00:25.22]
[00:26.62]So if you don't
[00:27.68]Mind I'd like to know you better
[00:30.33]
[00:31.06]Take me the long way around your town
[00:35.92]
[00:36.59]Where you're the queen with the silver crown
[00:41.39]
[00:41.99]I want the secrets you keep
[00:45.59]The shine underneath
[00:47.92]Of the diamond I think I just found
[00:52.65]Take me the long way around
[00:59.63]
[01:03.89]I'd love to see just
[01:05.42]Where your daddy met your mamma
[01:08.48]
[01:10.06]Your hand me down '99 impala
[01:13.75]
[01:14.97]Show me the field you danced in clover
[01:18.00]The harvest in October
[01:20.39]When the leaves fall from the sky
[01:22.72]Just like a Sunday drive
[01:25.14]Take me the long way around your town
[01:29.79]
[01:30.44]Where you're the queen with the silver crown
[01:35.21]
[01:35.87]I want the secrets you keep the shine underneath
[01:41.85]Of the diamond I think I just found
[01:46.64]Take me the long way around
[01:53.67]
[02:01.34]I didn't think tonight when I walked in
[02:04.92]
[02:06.20]I'd be falling for somewhere I've never been
[02:10.50]
[02:13.47]Take me the long way around your town
[02:18.33]
[02:19.02]Where you're the queen with the silver crown
[02:23.67]
[02:24.43]I want your red blushing stories
[02:28.11]Your faults and your glories
[02:30.78]That made you who you are right now
[02:35.17]Take me the long way around
[02:42.17]
[02:44.21]Take me the long way around
data.trans:
[ti:The Long Way]
[ar:Brett Eldredge]
[al:Brett Eldredge]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.15]//
[00:10.31]别怀疑 当我第一眼看到你 就迷上了你
[00:14.38]
[00:16.21]在这灯红酒绿的迷幻城市
[00:20.17]
[00:21.06]你环视一眼 说这就是你要的城市啊
[00:25.22]
[00:26.62]如果你不介意
[00:27.68]我想了解你多一点
[00:30.33]
[00:31.06]带我漫步你的家乡 共享美好风光
[00:35.92]
[00:36.59]在这儿你是公主
[00:41.39]
[00:41.99]我想知道你的更多小秘密
[00:45.59]我想我
[00:47.92]看到了你心底散发的钻石光芒
[00:52.65]带我漫步你的家乡 共享美好风光
[00:59.63]
[01:03.89]我想拜访
[01:05.42]你的爸爸妈妈
[01:08.48]
[01:10.06]你带我四处逛
[01:13.75]
[01:14.97]带我看你跳舞的舞台
[01:18.00]带我看丰收的金秋十月
[01:20.39]当漫天飘落黄叶
[01:22.72]就像在周末开车闲逛
[01:25.14]带我漫步你的家乡 共享美好风光
[01:29.79]
[01:30.44]在这儿你是公主
[01:35.21]
[01:35.87]我想知道你的更多小秘密
[01:41.85]我想我
[01:46.64]看到了你心底散发的钻石光芒
[01:53.67]
[02:01.34]我今晚大概无法走进你的内心世界
[02:04.92]
[02:06.20]但我已经无法自拔 陷入了从未遇见的世界
[02:10.50]
[02:13.47]带我漫步你的家乡 共享美好风光
[02:18.33]
[02:19.02]在这儿你是公主
[02:23.67]
[02:24.43]我想听听你的初恋心动故事
[02:28.11]你的失败和成功故事
[02:30.78]是那一切成就了现在这个完美的你
[02:35.17]带我漫步你的家乡 共享美好风光
[02:42.17]
[02:44.21]带我漫步你的家乡 共享美好风光
